div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 106 S. Euphemia environs, Corfu (anc. (263) Corcyra), before 1846 Burial: 4th cent. B.C.? (T) Contents: c. 150 AR. Pot hoard Autonomous issues of Epirus, Corcyra, Leucas and "Corinthian colonies of Acarnania" (all Pegasi?) Disposition: unknown Riemann, Recherches archéologiques sur les îles ioniennes 1 (Paris, 1879), pp. 24-5
